import React, { useState } from 'react'; import '../styles/PersonForm.css'; const PersonForm = ({ onAddPerson }) => { const [selectedOption, setSelectedOption] = useState(null); // null, 'travail' ou 'formation' const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ nom: '', prenom: '', telephone: '', quartier: '', region: '', pays: 'Mali', profession: '', entreprise: '', formation: '', daara: '', photo: '' }); const handleOptionSelect = (option) => { setSelectedOption(option); }; const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Validation if (!selectedOption) { alert('Veuillez choisir votre situation professionnelle'); return; } const personToAdd = { ...formData, travail: selectedOption === 'travail' }; onAddPerson(personToAdd); setSelectedOption(null); setFormData({ nom: '', prenom: '', telephone: '', quartier: '', region: '', pays: 'S√©n√©gal', profession: '', entreprise: '', formation: '', daara: '', photo: '' }); alert('Inscription r√©ussie!'); }; return (
